Theatrum poetarum, or, A compleat collection of the poets especially the most eminent, of all ages, the antients distinguish't from the moderns in their several alphabets : with some observations and reflections upon many of them, particularly those of our own nation : together with a prefatory discourse of the poets and poetry in generall / by Edward Phillips. Phillips, Edward, 1630-1696?
[33], 192, 261, [2] p.
Printed for Charles Smith ..., London : 1675.
Errata: p. [33]. Advertisement: [2] p. at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
